answers.answer: No. My baby has been 2 n a half bigger since the 1st ultrasound when I was like 10 weeks. I'm now 32 weeks n doc said it's nothing to worry abt. I weigh 137 lbs n gained 17 lbs so far. Nothing to worry abt. Doct said if it's bigger then 3 weeks it may indicate some concerns
Mine is already showing 2.7 weeks bigger.just took glucose challenge test,negative result.

question: M also overweight.26 weeks pregnant usg showing baby is big ,gest.age 28.4 days  and weighying 1.25 kg.no diabetes at all.everything is fine.is there any problem.
title: big baby
